title: Apple and carrot Christmas pudding
ingredients: ['4 carrots - peeled and grated', '2 apples - peeled, cored and grated', '175g sultanas (optional)', '110g fine breadcrumbs', '200g plain flour', '1 dessertspoon baking powder', '1 dessertspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '150g butter', '100g caster sugar', '4 eggs']
